info.author: John Belmonte
info.description:
The giftfile system is a specification for marking computer files
containing nonproprietary intellectual works, and an infrastructure
for allowing users of such works to make supporting donations.

Provided here are the basic tools required for participation in this
gift economy.  Currently, it consists of a developer's library written
in Python.

This is a reference implementation developed by the Giftfile Project.
info.name: giftfile-system
info.html_description:
The giftfile system is a specification for marking computer files containing nonproprietary intellectual works, and an infrastructure for allowing users of such works to make supporting donations.

Provided here are the basic tools required for participation in this gift economy. Currently, it consists of a developer’s library written in Python.

This is a reference implementation developed by the Giftfile Project.
